Free, Funny, Simple App 

Quitting smoking is one of the best things you can do for your health and your wallet. I_STOP offers the support and tools you need to succeed, including access to various quitting methods and ways to manage urges. When you experience an urge to smoke, you can engage with the virtual cigarette on the app's home screen and distract yourself with games, health monitoring, and other activities...

Why Choose I_Stop?

Personalized Support

Tailored plans for your unique journey to quit smoking, based on your daily cigarette consumption, preferred brand, and spending preferences..

Progress Tracking

Monitor your achievements and financial gains in one place. Track milestones and celebrate your success.
Expert Advice: Access resources and tips for a healthier, smoke-free life, including guidance from experienced mentors..

Cost Savings

Watch your savings grow as you cut out cigarettes, and see how much you've saved with the Money Saved Calculator.

Expert Advice

Access resources and tips for a healthier, smoke-free life, including guidance from experienced mentors.

Community Connection

Join a supportive group of others on the same path, and access mentorship from experienced users..

Rewards and Discounts

Stay motivated with rewards and exclusive offers for staying on track.

Features You'll Love

Daily Motivation

Inspiring messages and tips to keep you on track, available throughout your journey.

Money Saved Calculator

Track how much you save each day and over time as you cut back or quit smoking.

Quit Plans

Choose from various plans based on your smoking habits and goals, whether you want to quit immediately or gradually reduce your usage.

Success Tracking:

Celebrate your progress with milestones and achievements, while keeping track of your journey..

Community Connection

Join a supportive group of others on the same path, and access mentorship from experienced users.

Achievements and Profile Management

Track your achievements and edit your profile within the app. Switch between immediate quitting or gradual reduction modes as needed.

Premium Features and Mentor Assistance

You can request assistance from a mentor of your choice. Premium users gain access to tasks assigned by their mentors to aid in their quit-smoking journey.
